spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent spatial alignment. Layout, door swings, and window placements are nearly identical to the 2D plan. Proportions of the bedrooms and utility areas are preserved accurately.

structural_fidelity.notes: Full compliance. Roof is removed with all internal walls clearly visible. No text or measurement lines present. The model is correctly floating on a dark neutral background.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement matches the plan perfectly, including the specific sofa arrangement, dining table set-up, and bed orientations.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High adherence to style. Low-poly geometry with flat shading is used. Minor penalty for slight fuzziness/softness in the render edges which deviates from crisp vector-like low-poly styles, but the isometric perspective is perfectly executed.

detected_errors.description: Very slight blurring/softening of geometry edges instead of perfectly sharp low-poly polygons.
